Package net.chocomint.math.matrix

Class BasicMatrix<T,M extends BasicMatrix<T,?>>

java.lang.Object
net.chocomint.math.matrix.BasicMatrix<T,M>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of stored data
M - the implemented matrix
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComputableMatrix
public abstract class BasicMatrix<T,M extends BasicMatrix<T,?>> extends Object
The BasicMatrix class store a basic two-dimensional List.
